messages: You have a strange dream about dragons.
Your dreams give you a strange scaly feeling.
You have a disturbing dream of rampaging in a village.
While dreaming, you see a distinctively dragon-like reflection of yourself.
You blissfully dream of soaring over a human village.  The thought of destroying it and abducting the chiefs daughter is somewhat disturbing.
You have a disturbingly lifelike dream of living as a dragon.
In your dream you are the nightmare of a human.
You have a disturbingly satisfying dream of ravaging a human village.
You dream of raiding a castle and abducting the princess.
